title: Kenneth Branagh Directs Live-Action Version Of 'Cinderella' For Disney
teaser: Disney's dream is that Cinderella will sweep up at the box office just like the live-action Alice and Maleficent did before her. Disney aims to make $100 million at the global box office this weekend.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
